targets.query: SELECT sum("dataflow_busy") / (sum("dataflow_busy")+sum("dfo_busy") + sum("waiting_for_decision")) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.datafloworchestratorinfo.Info" WHERE "partition_id"= '$partition' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("dfo_busy") / (sum("dataflow_busy")+sum("dfo_busy") + sum("waiting_for_decision")) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.datafloworchestratorinfo.Info" WHERE "partition_id"= '$partition' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("waiting_for_decision") / (sum("dataflow_busy")+sum("dfo_busy") + sum("waiting_for_decision")) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.datafloworchestratorinfo.Info" WHERE "partition_id"= '$partition' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("generated_trigger_records"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.${TRBInstance}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(mean("received_trigger_decisions"), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.${TRBInstance}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("loop_counter")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.${TRBInstance}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT non_negative_derivative(cumulative_sum(sum("sleep_counter")), 1s) FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.${TRBInstance}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("average_millisecond_per_trigger") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.${TRBInstance}') AND $timeFilter AND "average_millisecond_per_trigger" >= 0  GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT distinct("pending_fragments") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.${TRBInstance}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT distinct("fragments_in_the_book") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.${TRBInstance}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT distinct("pending_trigger_decisions") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.${TRBInstance}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("lost_fragments") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.${TRBInstance}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("unexpected_fragments") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.${TRBInstance}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("invalid_requests") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.${TRBInstance}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("duplicated_trigger_ids") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.${TRBInstance}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("timed_out_trigger_records") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.${TRBInstance}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("unexpected_trigger_decisions") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.${TRBInstance}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT distinct("abandoned_trigger_records") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.${TRBInstance}') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("average_data_request_width") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.${TRBInstance}') AND $timeFilter AND "average_data_request_width" >= 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT mean("average_decision_width") FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.${TRBInstance}') AND $timeFilter AND "average_decision_width" >= 0 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT "number_of_elements" / "capacity" * 100 FROM "dunedaq.appfwk.queueinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.data_fragments_q') AND $timeFilter
SELECT "number_of_elements" / "capacity" * 100 FROM "dunedaq.appfwk.queueinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.trigger_decision_from_netq') AND $timeFilter
SELECT "number_of_elements"/"capacity"  * 100 FROM "dunedaq.appfwk.queueinfo.Info" WHERE ("source_id" = '${partition}.${application}.trigger_record_q') AND $timeFilter

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY="partition_id" where $timeFilter
list.label: Partition name
list.name: partition
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY="partition_id" where $timeFilter

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES FROM "dunedaq.dfmodules.triggerrecordbuilderinfo.Info" WITH KEY="source_id" WHERE $timeFilter AND "partition_id"='${partition}'
list.label: Application name
list.name: application
